ACAS.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a British organization that tries to end disagreements about pay, conditions at work etc between the management of a business and its workers
ACAS.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: Advisory, Conciliation and Arbitration Service; a government organization in Britain that attempts to solve disagreements between employers and employees
ACAS.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Under terms agreed with ACAS, both sides have agreed not to comment during negotiations.
